meaningMnemonic: Your 趣味 is your hobby. It's the thing you do on habit. A <kanji>bad</kanji> hobby is a habit that you do all the time that's no good. This is a <vocabulary>bad habit</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
